snippet.textDisplay:
I'm like 75-80% sure Dabi is Touya. There is a handful of evidence that seems to be pointing in that direction, but that would be too predictable. Knowing Horikoshi, there's a chance it could be a twist.
What if Dabi knew Touya? Maybe he was a classmate/acquaintance of Touya and they developed a sort of bond because of either their quirks or both of them had terrible home lives. Due to their powerful quirks, maybe they both got scouted by the same Organization that trained Hawks. During either a mission or training, something went horribly wrong. Either Dabi or Toya's quirk went out of control and Touya died while Dabi was horribly scarred and both were left for dead.
Dabi attempts to return to the organization, only to find out he's been replaced by Hawks and he's wiped off like he never existed. Thus, he becomes a villian...
snippet.textOriginal:
I'm like 75-80% sure Dabi is Touya. There is a handful of evidence that seems to be pointing in that direction, but that would be too predictable. Knowing Horikoshi, there's a chance it could be a twist. 
What if Dabi knew Touya? Maybe he was a classmate/acquaintance of Touya and they developed a sort of bond because of either their quirks or both of them had terrible home lives. Due to their powerful quirks, maybe they both got scouted by the same Organization that trained Hawks. During either a mission or training, something went horribly wrong. Either Dabi or Toya's quirk went out of control and Touya died while Dabi was horribly scarred and both were left for dead. 
Dabi attempts to return to the organization, only to find out he's been replaced by Hawks and he's wiped off like he never existed. Thus, he becomes a villian...

* sniff * I should get my lazy ass to watch this anime... or Trigun... or any of the 900 anime´s that i have written down but never had time to watch them cause working myself to an early grave for free sounded fun. But since i´m having my last day at work tomorrow... don´t worry i live off welfare. Now i may actually have time to watch something like... the 1997 Beserk that i never got to. Or finish up all the 80 games that i have on steam and get all the achivements on them. Or 100% the games that i have on my ps4... Perhaps repair my NES to find out whats wrong with it. Or complete pokemon red on my GBC... all the pokemons at lvl 100... damnit cant do that cause i dont have friends. Oh well. Im looking forward to having time to enjoy things in life again.

snippet.textDisplay: So, we're absolutely sure Dabi isn't Hisashi Midoriya, right? snippet.textDisplay: Tbh i prefer Dabi to be an illegitimate child of Endeavor, born roughly the same time as Natsuo. Endeavor disillusioned by the fact that his wife Rei has failed giving him his "masterpiece" twice in a row, decides to use his connections to cheat on his wife with another fire quirk user in order to see the results (would doubling the quirks effectiveness but also doubling its weakness be enough to become no. 1)  and gives him an extra insurance plan in case a pregnant Rei fails him a third time. At first, Endeavor monetarily supports Dabi and his mother discretely while monitoring Dabi's life from a far to see if he's worthy to become his successor, but after Shoto's quirk manifested and becomes Endeavor's long awaited successor, Endeavor stops supporting his illegitimate child and his mistress. Angered by Endeavor just throwing them away like toys, they approach Endeavor to which he responds by telling them he finally has a successor worthy of his time and calls them failures; Dabi for being too weak to be of any use to Endeavor and Dabi's mom for failing in her one and only chance to give him his successor and wasting his time and money.  What once was a relatively happy life, became a nightmare for Dabi and his mother who has to fend for themselves now that the father, whom Dabi had never met, abandoned them. This would explain why Dabi idolizes Stain's ideology of False Heroes, why he probably hates Endeavor and has disdain for the rest of his family,  and why he accentuates the Todoroki instead of just calling him Shoto during the training camp arc.
snippet.textOriginal: Tbh i prefer Dabi to be an illegitimate child of Endeavor, born roughly the same time as Natsuo. Endeavor disillusioned by the fact that his wife Rei has failed giving him his "masterpiece" twice in a row, decides to use his connections to cheat on his wife with another fire quirk user in order to see the results (would doubling the quirks effectiveness but also doubling its weakness be enough to become no. 1)  and gives him an extra insurance plan in case a pregnant Rei fails him a third time. At first, Endeavor monetarily supports Dabi and his mother discretely while monitoring Dabi's life from a far to see if he's worthy to become his successor, but after Shoto's quirk manifested and becomes Endeavor's long awaited successor, Endeavor stops supporting his illegitimate child and his mistress. Angered by Endeavor just throwing them away like toys, they approach Endeavor to which he responds by telling them he finally has a successor worthy of his time and calls them failures; Dabi for being too weak to be of any use to Endeavor and Dabi's mom for failing in her one and only chance to give him his successor and wasting his time and money.  What once was a relatively happy life, became a nightmare for Dabi and his mother who has to fend for themselves now that the father, whom Dabi had never met, abandoned them. This would explain why Dabi idolizes Stain's ideology of False Heroes, why he probably hates Endeavor and has disdain for the rest of his family,  and why he accentuates the Todoroki instead of just calling him Shoto during the training camp arc.

To me in the begining, Dabi was an illegitimate child of Endeavor, since he has blue flames, since he teased Shoto when they attacked the training camp, since he confronted Endeavor after his fight against the high end nomu, and now that he tells Hawk who he is just after a flash back confirming he was Endeavor's fan with his little figurine and since he's also teamed up with Endeavor.
( Btw the ice man is a woman, and i guess, if the author does a flash forward after this battle ( like in naruto or dbz for example ) i bet her and dabi will have kids lol.
